remarks: Lemma for ~ dia2dim .  Convert membership in closed subspace ` ( I `` ( U .\/ V ) ) ` to a lattice ordering.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dia2dimlem10.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem10.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem10.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem10.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem10.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem10.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem10.y $e |- Y = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem10.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` Y ) $.
dia2dimlem10.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` Y ) $.
dia2dimlem10.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem10.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dia2dimlem10.u $e |- ( ph -> ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem10.v $e |- ( ph -> ( V e. A /\ V .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem10.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. T ) $.
dia2dimlem10.fe $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( I ` ( U .\/ V ) ) ) $.
dia2dimlem10 $p |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) .<_ ( U .\/ V ) ) $.
